column4: hey i am trying to vnc into a box using terminal server client
i installed xtightvnc
and the error i get is is vnc server supports 4.0 (client 3.3)
how do i update xtightvnc to 4.0?
why do you want to do that? :)
oops
because i cannot vnc into the server i need to vnc into
what version of Ubuntu are you using?
could you please check for me the versions listed at http://packages.ubuntu.com/xtightvnc
Google says: No results found for "vnc server supports 4.0 (client 3.3)". Odd. Try RealVNC instead
realvnc doesnt show up on synaptic?
please hold, i will investigate
try any of the clients listed at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/VNC#VNC%20Clients.  do they work?
vinagre no worky
what error?
dunno what to say
keep trying different clients.  Or different servers.
I recommend you use vino and rdesktop.  They work well together.
vino is a server
where is the server?
